customers.description: With T'Compro App, you can rediscover the experience of buying for your favorite products at your trusted local store.

1.text: Choose products from your favorite brands to get your order ready. Select details such as payment method and whether you prefer in-store pickup or delivery.

2.text: Browse nearby stores offering the products you’re looking for. Compare deals and choose the best option for you.

3.text: Sit back and wait for your delivery to arrive, or pick up your order when it’s ready in-store.

stores.description: Boost your sales and manage everything from one place.

1.text: Easily set up the app to function the way you manage your business: customers, product inventory, employees, and special offers.

2.text: Each order includes customer details, requested products, and preferences such as payment method and delivery or pickup. Review and start dispatching with a single click.

3.text: Keep track of your business finances with simple and easy-to-use auto-generated metrics.
